meanings.sent1: The unmeasured land stretched far beyond the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The scientist left the unmeasured variables out of the equation.
meanings.sent3: The unmeasured amount of cookies disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her unmeasured kindness knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unmeasured darkness of the cave sent shivers down his spine.

meanings.sent1: His unmeasured enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
